extensionDescription.message: Stay informed of the availability of your favorite e-sports team!

browserActionOnlineTitle.description: Title of the button in the browser action bar when the stream is online

browserActionOfflineTitle.description: Title of the button in the browser action bar when the stream is offline

notificationOnlineTitle.description: Notification title when the stream is online

notificationStatusChangeTitle.description: Notification title when the stream is offline

popupOfflineMessage.description: Message displayed in the popup when the stream is offline

delay.description: Displayed when delay is enabled on the stream
